Articles.Content: What if an alien race had five fingers, just like us... But they used the middle finger to greet, unlike us. What do you think would happen? Would we just assume they treated the middle finger as a weapon of mass destruction too? Or would we be like, "Oh, well they just have different ways of doing things." Also, imagine a species of creatures that look like dogs, but standing up! Holy crap I am scared about the future.

As soon as they first land in a city some idiot will go "hey, he just flipped me off! Ive gotta shoot him!!"

And then we all die.
We run into issues like this among differant human cultures.
